#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string.h>
#define pb push_back
#define sz(c) c.size()
using namespace std;

typedef long long int ll;
typedef vector<int> vi;
typedef vector<string> vs;
#define mod 1000000007

/*static inline ll scan2()
{
    ll x=0;
    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }

    return(x);
}

static inline int scan1()
{
    int x=0;

    char c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c<'0'||c>'9')
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    {
        x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-'0';
        c=getchar_unlocked();
    }

    return(x);
}


static inline void WriteInt(long long int x)
{
    char s[15];
    int l=0;
    do
    {
        s[l++]=(x%10+'0');
        x/=10;
    }while(x);
    l--;
    while(l>=0)
    {
        putchar_unlocked(s[l]);
        l--;
    }
    putchar_unlocked('\n');
} */


bool comp(string s1,string s2)
{
    string t1=s1+s2;
    string t2=s2+s1;
    return(t1>t2);
}



int main()
{
 int T;
 int N;
 scanf("%d",&T);
 while(T--)
 {
     scanf("%d",&N);
     vi V;
     int x;
     for(int i=1;i<=N;i++)
     {
         scanf("%d",&x);
         V.pb(x);
     }
     sort(V.begin(),V.end());
     int seconds=0;
     int killed=0;
     int reload=0;
     for(int i=0;i<V.size();i++)
     {
         if(V[i]-seconds<=0)
         {
             break;
         }

         if(V[i]-seconds>0)
         {
             seconds++;
             reload++;
             killed++;
         }
         if(reload==6)
         {
             seconds++;
             reload=0;
         }

     }

     bool allkilled=killed==N;
       if(!allkilled)
       {
           printf("Killed %d\n",killed);
           continue;
       }
       printf("Bhai Ho!\n");
 }
 return 0;
}
